SEARCH
Package Distributed.rmi

Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Distributed.rmi.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientRMIInterface, Serializable, Remote, viewListeners
public class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements viewListeners, ClientRMIInterface, Serializable
Class that represents a client that interacts with a remote server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
See Also:

    • Client

      public Client(ServerRMIInterface server) throws RemoteException, SameNicknameException
      Constructor for the Client class.
      Parameters:
      server - The server to connect the client to.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a remote communication error.
      SameNicknameException - If a duplicate nickname is specified.

    • Client

      Constructor for the Client class with a specified port.
      Parameters:
      server - The server to connect the client to.
      port - The port for the client connection.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a remote communication error.
      SameNicknameException - If a duplicate nickname is specified.

    • Client

      public Client(ServerRMIInterface server, int port, RMIClientSocketFactory csf, RMIServerSocketFactory ssf) throws RemoteException, SameNicknameException
      Constructor for the Client class with a specified port and connection factories.
      Parameters:
      server - The server to connect the client to.
      port - The port for the client connection.
      csf - The RMIClientSocketFactory object for the client connection.
      ssf - The RMIServerSocketFactory object for the client connection.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a remote communication error.
      SameNicknameException - If a duplicate nickname is specified.

    • notifySelectedCoordinates

      public void notifySelectedCoordinates(SlotChoice[] SC) throws RemoteException, NotCatchableException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException
      Notifies the server the slots selected by the user.
      Specified by:
      notifySelectedCoordinates in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      SC - Object that contains the coordinates of the selected tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • notifyOrder

      public void notifyOrder(OrderChoice o) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies the server the order chosen by the player for the insert.
      Specified by:
      notifyOrder in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      o - Object that contains the order of the tiles for the insert.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • notifyInsert

      public void notifyInsert(int column) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies the server the column where the user want to insert the selected slots.
      Specified by:
      notifyInsert in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      column - The column where the player wants to put the tiles in.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.
